amendment.description: An amendment comprised of the following amendments printed in Part A of House Report 117-420 as en bloc No. 8: Nos. 183 and 184.
amendment.purpose: Amendments en bloc No. 8 comprised amendments numbered 183 and 184, printed in Part A of House Report 117-420.

vote.text: On agreeing to the DeLauro amendments (A009) Agreed to by recorded vote: 238 - 191 (Roll no. 381).

action.text: Amendments en bloc (A009) offered by Ms. DeLauro.
